articles.title: Trump admin wonders why Europe hasn't been 'helpful' on Iran
articles.description: Pompeo is disappointed with our European allies on Iran It's a safe bet that there are officials in London, Berlin, and Paris who are feeling the same way.
articles.content:
The Trump administration clearly rattled the international landscape with its latest offensive against Iran, and as the Wall Street Journalreported, it’s not altogether pleased with the response from some of the leading U.S. allies.

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: What to expect from Harvey Weinstein trial
articles.description: Disgraced movie mogul Harvey Weinstein is scheduled to stand trial on rape charges in New York this week, more than two years after The New York Times and The New Yorker published investigative reports. The New York Times' Megan Twohey discusses.

articles.title: Pompeo dismisses possible Iranian retaliation as 'a little noise'
articles.description: Pompeo may come to regret dismissing the prospects of Iranian retaliatory strikes as "a little noise."
articles.content: As Iraqi lawmakers vote to kick American forces out of Iraq, U.S. officials urge Americans to evacuate Iraq for their own safety, Iran accelerates its nuclear program, and missions against ISIS are curtailed, Secretary of State Mike Pompeo insisted on Meet th… [+1536 chars]

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Congresswoman says a conversation is needed on Iran
articles.description: Rep. Elissa Slotkin, D-Mich., of the Armed Services Committee, will lead a vote on a War Powers Resolution in the House to limit Trump's authority to wage war in the Persian Gulf. Rep. Slotkin joins Morning Joe to discuss.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: House to vote on war powers resolution to limit Trump's military actions
articles.description: House Speaker Nancy Pelosi announced the House will vote soon on a war powers resolution to limit President Donald Trump's military actions after he ordered the killing of top Iranian general Qassem Soleimani last week, escalating tensions with Tehran.
